document_data.caption: From the top left clockwise: [[magma strider]], [[magma brute]], [[magma claw]], and [[magma hurler]].
document_data.name: Magma Beast
document_data.mainbody: '''Magma beasts''' were a variety of [[elemental]] composed of magma that originated in the [[Elemental Chaos]].
document_data.Personality: These creatures varied in their level of intelligence, with brutes and hurlers being the smartest.
document_data.Abilities: All magma beasts were immune to the effects of [[petrification]], had some resistance to [[fire]], and were particularly vulnerable to cold-based [[spell]]s and abilities.
document_data.History:
Following the [[Spellplague]], many magma beasts made their way through [[elemental vortex|elemental vortices]] and planar rifts into volcanic regions that were on [[Toril]] and within its [[Underdark]].

In [[1479 DR]], all four types of magma beast could be found inhabiting [[Mount Hotenow]]. There many served in the fighting forces of the [[Cult of Maegera]].

Society.Languages: All magma beasts were capable of speaking the [[Primordial language]].
Society.Relationships:
Brutes and hurlers could be bribed with regular offerings of food. They occasionally bullied claws and striders into fighting alongside them.

All magma beasts were sometimes lured into serving [[fire archon]]s, [[fire giant]]s, [[salamander]]s, or even an [[eye of flame]].

Ecology.Diet: These creatures could subsist on merely [[clay]], ores, and even minor elementals, though they preferred to hunt and feast upon organic creatures, savoring the taste of burned flesh. Whenever they killed a [[humanoid]] they would devour them whole, including their equipment.
